title: Ardour
description: This community unites students on a common platform to showcase talents in dance, drama, music, songs, and all performing arts.

title: Agile
description: The student community for games and sports promotes participation in different competitive events in athletics like basketball, football, etc.

title: Analects
description: 'Humatronics' and 'Wallzine' by 'Analects' are renowned talent searches and wall magazines, garnering widespread acclaim over the years.

title: Acuity
description: The AOT innovation community offers engineers a platform to showcase software, hardware, and robotics innovations through competitive events and quizzes.

title: Acclivities
description: Acclivities members organize NSS activities, environmental awareness, and campaigns against alcohol addiction and ragging.
